verses.verse: "I am inquired <S%H1875><s%> of by those who didn't <S%H3808><s%> ask; <S%H7592><s%> I am found <S%H4672><s%> by those who didn't <S%H3808><s%> seek <S%H1245><s%> me: <S%H559><s%> I said, See me, <S%H1471><s%> see me, to a nation that was not called <S%H7121><s%> by my name. <S%H8034><s%>

I have spread out <S%H6566><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%> to a rebellious <S%H5637><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> who walk <S%H1980><s%> in a way <S%H1870><s%> that is not good, <S%H2896><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their own thoughts; <S%H4284><s%>

a people <S%H5971><s%> who provoke <S%H3707><s%> me to my face <S%H6440><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> sacrificing <S%H2076><s%> in gardens, <S%H1593><s%> and burning incense <S%H6999><s%> on bricks; <S%H3843><s%>

who sit <S%H3427><s%> among the graves, <S%H6913><s%> and lodge <S%H3885><s%> in the secret places; <S%H5341><s%> who eat <S%H398><s%> pig <S%H2386><s%>'s flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and broth <S%H4839><s%> of abominable <S%H6292><s%> things is in their vessels; <S%H3627><s%>

who say, <S%H559><s%> Stand <S%H7126><s%> by yourself, <S%H5066><s%> don't come near to me, <S%H6942><s%> for I am holier than you. <S%H6227><s%> These are a smoke in my nose, <S%H639><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> that burns <S%H3344><s%> all the day. <S%H3117><s%>

"Behold, <S%H3789><s%> it is written before <S%H6440><s%> me: <S%H2814><s%> I will not keep silence, but will recompense, <S%H7999><s%> yes, <S%H7999><s%> I will recompense into their bosom, <S%H2436><s%>

your own iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> and the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "who have burned incense <S%H6999><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and blasphemed <S%H2778><s%> me on the hills; <S%H1389><s%> therefore will I first <S%H7223><s%> measure <S%H4058><s%> their work <S%H6468><s%> into their bosom. <S%H2436><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "As the new wine <S%H8492><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%> in the cluster, <S%H811><s%> and one says, <S%H559><s%> <S%H7843><s%> 'Don't destroy it, <S%H1293><s%> for a blessing is in it: <S%H6213><s%>' so will I do for my servants <S%H5650><s%>' sake, <S%H7843><s%> that I may not destroy them all.

I will bring forth <S%H3318><s%> a seed <S%H2233><s%> out of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and out of Judah <S%H3063><s%> an inheritor <S%H3423><s%> of my mountains; <S%H2022><s%> and my chosen <S%H972><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> it, <S%H5650><s%> and my servants shall dwell there. <S%H7931><s%>

Sharon <S%H8289><s%> shall be a fold <S%H5116><s%> of flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Achor <S%H5911><s%> a place for herds <S%H1241><s%> to lie down in, <S%H7258><s%> for my people <S%H5971><s%> who have sought me. <S%H1875><s%>

"But you who forsake <S%H5800><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who forget <S%H7913><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> who prepare <S%H6186><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> for Fortune, <S%H1409><s%> and who fill <S%H4390><s%> up mixed wine <S%H4469><s%> to Destiny; <S%H4507><s%>

I will destine <S%H4487><s%> you to the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and you shall all bow down <S%H3766><s%> to the slaughter; <S%H2874><s%> because when I called, <S%H7121><s%> you didn't <S%H6030><s%> answer; when I spoke, <S%H1696><s%> you didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen; but you did <S%H6213><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and chose <S%H977><s%> that in which I didn't <S%H2654><s%> delight."

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> "Behold, <S%H5650><s%> my servants shall eat, <S%H398><s%> but you shall be hungry; <S%H7456><s%> behold, <S%H5650><s%> my servants shall drink, <S%H8354><s%> but you shall be thirsty; <S%H6770><s%> behold, <S%H5650><s%> my servants shall rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> but you shall be disappointed; <S%H954><s%>

behold, <S%H5650><s%> my servants shall sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H2898><s%> of heart, <S%H3820><s%> but you shall cry <S%H6817><s%> for sorrow <S%H3511><s%> of heart, <S%H3820><s%> and shall wail <S%H3213><s%> for anguish <S%H7667><s%> of spirit. <S%H7307><s%>

You shall leave <S%H3240><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> for a curse <S%H7621><s%> to my chosen; <S%H972><s%> and the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H136><s%> will kill <S%H4191><s%> you; <S%H7121><s%> and he will call his servants <S%H5650><s%> by another <S%H312><s%> name: <S%H8034><s%>

so that he who blesses <S%H1288><s%> himself in the earth <S%H776><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> himself in the God <S%H430><s%> of truth; <S%H543><s%> and he who swears <S%H7650><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> shall swear <S%H7650><s%> by the God <S%H430><s%> of truth; <S%H543><s%> because the former <S%H7223><s%> troubles <S%H6869><s%> are forgotten, <S%H7911><s%> and because they are hidden <S%H5641><s%> from my eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

"For, <S%H1254><s%> behold, I create new <S%H2319><s%> heavens <S%H8064><s%> and a new <S%H2319><s%> earth; <S%H776><s%> and the former <S%H7223><s%> things shall not be remembered, <S%H2142><s%> nor come <S%H5927><s%> into mind. <S%H3820><s%>

But be you glad <S%H7797><s%> and rejoice <S%H1523><s%> forever <S%H5703><s%> in that which I create; <S%H1254><s%> for, <S%H1254><s%> behold, I create Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a rejoicing, <S%H1525><s%> and her people <S%H5971><s%> a joy. <S%H4885><s%>

I will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and joy <S%H7797><s%> in my people; <S%H5971><s%> and there shall be heard <S%H8085><s%> in her no more the voice <S%H6963><s%> of weeping <S%H1065><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of crying. <S%H2201><s%>

"There shall be no more there an infant <S%H5764><s%> of days, <S%H3117><s%> nor an old man <S%H2205><s%> who has not filled <S%H4390><s%> his days; <S%H3117><s%> for the child <S%H5288><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> and the sinner <S%H2398><s%> being one hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shall be accursed. <S%H7043><s%>
They shall build <S%H1129><s%> houses, <S%H1004><s%> and inhabit <S%H3427><s%> them; <S%H5193><s%> and they shall plant vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> their fruit. <S%H6529><s%>

They shall not build, <S%H1129><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> inhabit; <S%H3427><s%> they shall not plant, <S%H5193><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> eat: <S%H398><s%> for as the days <S%H3117><s%> of a tree <S%H6086><s%> shall be the days <S%H3117><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> and my chosen <S%H972><s%> shall long enjoy <S%H1086><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of their hands. <S%H3027><s%>

They shall not labor <S%H3021><s%> in vain, <S%H7385><s%> nor bring forth <S%H3205><s%> for calamity; <S%H928><s%> for they are the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the blessed <S%H1288><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and their offspring with them. <S%H6631><s%>
It shall happen that, <S%H7121><s%> before they call, I will answer; <S%H6030><s%> and while they are yet speaking, <S%H1696><s%> I will hear. <S%H8085><s%>

The wolf <S%H2061><s%> and the lamb <S%H2924><s%> shall feed <S%H7462><s%> together, <S%H259><s%> and the lion <S%H738><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> like the ox; <S%H1241><s%> and dust <S%H6083><s%> shall be the serpent <S%H5175><s%>'s food. <S%H3899><s%> They shall not hurt <S%H7489><s%> nor destroy <S%H7843><s%> in all my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
